source.g: Click each Communications Cloud feature icon to find out more.$$_null$$
Communications Cloud $$_null$$
Guidance$$_null$$
Guided sales processes and built-in rules support quoting, contracting, and ordering. The guided processes and rules help ensure that customer orders are valid and deliverable every time.
Asset Management $$_null$$

The customer wants to move, disconnect a service, or update an assetâ€™s details? No problem. Simplified MACD processes come out of the box, and you can customize the processes to suit your organization.
Personalized Offers $$_null$$
TM Forum compliant data structures support validated, personalized offers for your customers.
Digital Commerce $$_null$$
Scalable Digital Commerce components integrate with your organizationâ€™s web store and other applications.
Analytics$$_null$$
Tableau gives you predictive enterprise analytics, enabling your teams to make better, informed decisions.
Integration$$_null$$
OmniStudio tools and TM Forum compliant APIs accelerate integration.
Development$$_null$$
A focus on low-code application development supports secure and agile implementation and customization.
Business Processes$$_null$$
Specifically designed for your market, Communications Cloud includes digital front- and middle-office applications to streamline your business processes.
Learning$$_null$$
Complete role-based learning paths get your team up to speed with Communications Cloud.
Colaboration$$_null$$
Communications Cloud interfaces and tools facilitate collaboration between your BSS and OSS teams.
Order Management$$_null$$
Communications Cloud offers converged charging and service order management.
Success$$_null$$
The Global Competency Center gives you resources and guidance for long-term success with Communications Cloud.
Slack$$_null$$
Slack

connects your teams, tools, customers, and partners in a digital place thatâ€™s fast, flexible, and inclusive in a work-from-anywhere world. It helps customers break down communication and collaboration silos, embrace flexibility so employees can do their best work, and bring the power of automation to everyone.
The variable $$_null$$ is added to each text item so that it publishes as text and not an image. Code is add to On Enter to stop a screen reader from reading it.
